attributes.action: Reveal the MHRA trial results of the drug TRIAMAZON
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The drug TRIAMAZON has undergone trials by the MHRA for it's ability to beat cancer ,but the MHRA have refused to reveal the results...why? ,what have they got to hide?, are the MHRA above the law? (it is their legal duty to publish the results).

rejection.details: Please contact the MHRA directly in the first instance.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
